title: 3 Bed 3 Bath -Parking & Storage Included & Pet Friendly -A/C - 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 71674104', 'Rent: $4,000 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 3', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'One of the nicest rentals on the market!', ' Gorgeous two-level 3BR with 3 FULL BATHS!', 'Unit was completely renovated last year with no expense spared.', ' Enjoy central air, hardwood floors, a modern kitchen with granite and stainless appliances, laundry in building, modern baths, a backyard, and a driveway for two cars included in the rent.', 'There is a garage available where a third car can be parked.', 'All rooms are generously sized and can accommodate any mattress size.', 'Deposits: 1st, security, and broker fee.', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Gas Stove', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Yard', 'Agent:', 'Matthew', 'Phone: 617-872-7656', 'Email: matthew  <URL>', 'Follow us for new listings and real estate news!', '      Facebook: @RentSource          Instagram: @Rent_Source', '**', 'FOR MORE GREAT LISTINGS AND TO SIGN UP FOR AUTO LISTING UPDATES VISIT OUR WEBSITE AT WWW.RENTSOURCELLC.COM **', 'Rent Source supports Equal Housing Opportunity.', ' Rates, fee, and availability subject to change, so please call to verify details.', 'Pictures may not be of exact unit.']
